subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Yankees reacquired the seven-time All Star outfielder Alfonso Soriano, whose return to the Bronx may bring a sorely needed spark to a depleted and feeble lineup.
snippet: The Yankees reacquired the seven-time All Star outfielder Alfonso Soriano, whose return to the Bronx may bring a sorely needed spark to a depleted and feeble lineup.
